Advance Unit Lupicia:
Did you talk with Frederick?
I have been waiting for you to tell you about the Fafurion Temple.
The temple is divided into four zones. One of them is connected to the Fafurion's Nest. Okayti knows more about that zone.
The other three zones are occupied by Fafurion's minions. The zones are slightly different from one another. Consider your current situation and each zone's features when facing Fafurion's minions.
